verses.roman:
sāmānya eka śloka prabhu paḍena kīrtane
kene śloka paḍe--ihā keha nāhi jāne

synonyms: sāmānya—generally; eka—one; śloka—verse; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; paḍena—recites; kīrtane—while chanting; kene-why; śloka—that verse; paḍe—He recites; ihā—this; keha nāhi jāne—no one knows.
translation: Generally Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu recited a verse while dancing and chanting before the ratha, but no one knew why He was reciting that particular verse.
